info.name: OGame WBB4.1 Image Remover
info.description:
This Style removes the background and section images, resizes the header and can change the Announcement/New Post badges color (pink is default).
Also this Style removes the backgroundvideo for the OGamepage of the gameforgeportal.
info.additionalInfo:
Note: When you set your backgroundimage, using a not encrytped domain makes your browser display the connection as unsecure

5.11.16 - Made the skin work on all wbb4.1 OGame Boards
19.11.16 - Made it possible to change the color of new threads, added option to hide Sharebox, added option to always display display the quickreply
8.12.16 - Changed Editor backgroundcolor, made Usertitles larger. If you want a white Editor, enter #ffffff
